mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.name AS "name", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.email AS "email", a.professor AS "professor", a.professor_mobile AS "professorMobile", a.professor_email AS "professorEmail", a.professor_title AS "professorTitle", a.university AS "university", a.department AS "department", a.major AS "major", a.education AS "education", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_quant_teammate( id, team_id, name, mobile, email, professor, professor_mobile, professor_email, professor_title, university, department, major, education, create_time, update_time, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{teamId}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{professor}, #{professorMobile}, #{professorEmail}, #{professorTitle}, #{university}, #{department}, #{major}, #{education}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_quant_teammate SET team_id = #{teamId}, name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, professor = #{professor}, professor_mobile = #{professorMobile}, professor_email = #{professorEmail}, professor_title = #{professorTitle}, university = #{university}, department = #{department}, major = #{major}, education = #{education}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
